items: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

blocks.name: Inscrutable
blocks.text: [NAME] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain [NAME]'s intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

blocks.name: Spellcasting
blocks.text:
[NAME] is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC SDC[WIS], ATK[WIS] to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. [NAME] has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): *sacred flame*, *spare the dying*, *thaumaturgy*
1st level (4 slots): *command*, *detect evil and good*, *detect magic*
2nd level (3 slots): *lesser restoration*, *zone of truth*
3rd level (3 slots): *dispel magic*, *tongues*
4th level (3 slots): *banishment*, *freedom of movement*
5th level (2 slots): *flame strike*, *greater restoration*
6th level (1 slot): *heroes' feast*

blocks.name: Claw
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* ATK[STR] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* DMG[2d10 + STR] slashing damage.

blocks.name: Roar (3/Day)
blocks.text:
[NAME] emits a magical roar. Each time it roars before finishing a long rest, the roar is louder and the effect is different, as detailed below. Each creature within 500 feet of [NAME] and able to hear the roar must make a saving throw.

**First Roar.** Each creature that fails a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw is frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
**Second Roar.** Each creature that fails a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw is deafened and frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature is paralyzed and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
**Third Roar.** Each creature makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes DMG[8d10] thunder damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

blocks.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
blocks.text: [NAME] magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

blocks.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
blocks.text: [NAME] casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendaryActions.description: [NAME] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [NAME] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
